message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $12,000 is higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still above my budget. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $9,000. This is a fair price for both of us.
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $11,000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $10,800. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but I can't go higher than $9,500. This is a fair price considering your previous offers and my budget constraints.
I understand your frustration, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,750. This is my last offer before I consider other options.
